mapper.select: select CO_ID, CHRG_ID, PSWD, EMP_NO, SEQ_NO, ST_DATE, FIN_DATE, HR_CHRG, CHRG_INDC, PSWD_INIT_INDC, ADMIN_TYPE from hr002m
mapper.insert: insert into hr002m(CO_ID, CHRG_ID, PSWD, EMP_NO, SEQ_NO, ST_DATE, FIN_DATE, HR_CHRG, CHRG_INDC, PSWD_INIT_INDC, ADMIN_TYPE) values (#{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{chrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{seqNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{stDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{finDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{hrChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{chrgIndc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pswdInitIndc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{adminType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
